meanings.definition: A small, square doughnut covered in powdered sugar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious beignet for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh beignets every morning.
meanings.sent3: The beignet looked like a snowy treat on my plate.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a beignet.
meanings.sent5: The powdered sugar on the beignet made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: To fry or deep-fry a pastry dough.
meanings.sent1: I will beignet the dough for the party.
meanings.sent2: She loves to beignet pastries in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: He decided to beignet the dough in hot oil for a crispy texture.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly beignet the dough to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the beigneting dough filled the room.
